Data Fields
mem_pageinfo_t Struct Reference
Memory (RAM/Flash)

Holds the characteristics of a page. More...

#include <mem.h>

Collaboration diagram for mem_pageinfo_t:

Detailed Description

This structure contains the details for a page of memory.

Data Fields

int32_t num
 the page number
 
uint8_t type
 RAM or FLASH (page numbers are not unique between types)
 
uint32_t addr
 the address of the page
 
uint32_t size
 the size of the page
